description: This template deploys a base environment with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain. See https://github.com/oualabadmins/DevTest/tree/master/AD-base-config for details.
summary: This template deploys a multi-vm base environment on corpnet with an AD domain, SQL, SharePoint, app servers and Windows 10 VMs joined to the domain. Provisions an AD domain and joins member VMs. See https://github.com/oualabadmins/DevTest/tree/master/AD-base-config for details and deployment guidance.
